data.title: B Heaven To B Site Blindside
data.description: This Blindside is useful for flashing players playing under B Heaven, B Main, and behind the pillar on B Site, making it easier for you and your team to take or retake the site.

data.title: Mid Top To B Mail Blindside
data.description: This Blindside is useful for flashing players holding the close corner in Mid Mail and the entrance of B Heaven, allowing you to clear the corner safely.

data.title: B Mail To B Heaven Blindside
data.description: This Blindside is useful for flashing players holding in B Heaven.

data.title: A Main To A Site Blindside
data.description: This Blindside is useful for flashing players playing A Rafters, under A Rafters, and A Screens, making it easier for you and your team to take the site.
